A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can't believe I forgot to write a review for this movie\, considering I've seen it four times.  What a ride.  I've always had faith in King Rian Johnson\, and he proved his worth with this Stars Wars movie-that-also-wasn't-a-Star-Wars-movie.  He has an eye for detail.  Daisy Ridley really had her chance to shine in Episode IIX.  Everything just worked\, and don't get me started on Porgs.  BRING BACK JOHNSON FOR EPISODE IX!!!
